description: [``botocore``] Added new APIs for log anomaly detection feature.
[``botocore``] Documentation updates for AWS Glue Job Timeout and Autoscaling
[``botocore``] Amazon SageMaker Edge Manager provides lightweight model deployment feature to deploy machine learning models on requested devices.
[``botocore``] Fixed an issue with cross account QueryLineage
[``botocore``] Increased the character limit of the login message from 850 to 2000 characters.
